POST /api/articles.description: Adds a new article to the database.

requestBody.author: string (required)
requestBody.title: string (required)
requestBody.article_img_url: string (optional, defaults to a placeholder image)

exampleRequest.title: all tomorrows
exampleRequest.body: i am the one who knocks

GET /api/articles(pagination).description: Fetches a list of articles with optional pagination.

queries.limit: integer (optional), limits the number of articles returned. Defaults to 10.
queries.p: integer (optional), specifies the page of articles to fetch. Defaults to 1.

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments(p.description: Retrieves comments for a specific article with optional pagination.

queryParameters.limit: integer (optional, defaults to 10) - Limits the number of comments returned.
queryParameters.p: integer (optional, defaults to 1) - Specifies the page number for pagination.
